item.title: Docker
item.description: When we use docker then we do not need to care about the version of the stack. We also do not need to care about the application that is OS specific. In Docker we have containers and we put everything in teh container and can make multiple copy of the container and use it. Docker CLI and Desktop. There is Docker Daemon which builds the container and scale up and do everything.
